videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #01 - Introduction and What's New in Css 3
videos.description: Learn about What's new in Css Level 3

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #02 - What's Vendor Prefixes
videos.description:
Learn about Vendor Prefixes how and why to use it 

A good website to check properties compatibility with browsers
http://caniuse.com/

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #03 - Border Radius
videos.description: Learn how to make border radius for elements in css3

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #04 - Box Shadow
videos.description: Learn everything about the shadows of elements and how to use all its properties

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #05 - Box Sizing
videos.description: Learn about Box Sizing and how to exclude padding and border from element size

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #06 - Examples: Box Shadow, Border Radius
videos.description: Training on Box Shadow, Border Radius

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #07 - Text Shadows
videos.description: Learn everything about shadow of text and Text-Shadow property

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #08 - Text Overflow
videos.description: learn how to control the text that goes out of flow with text-overflow property

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #09 - Word Wrap, White Space
videos.description: Learn word-wrap property and the white-space

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #10 - 2D Transform - Rotate
videos.description: Learn transforming element and how to do rotate in 2D Transform

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #11 - 2D Transform - Scale
videos.description: Learn how to scale element with css3 scale property

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #12 - 2D Transform - Translate
videos.description: Learn how to move element with Css3 Translate

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #13 - 2D Transform - Skew
videos.description: Learn how to skew the element with css3 Skew property

videos.title: [ Css3 In Arabic ] #14 - 2D Transform - Matrix
videos.description: شرح خاصية ال Matrix التي تحتوى على كل خواص ال 2D Transform

videos.title: Learn Css3 in Arabic #15 - 3D Transform - Rotate X, Y, Z()
videos.description:

rotateX
rotateY
rotateZ
